attributes.action: Increase free parking time from 2 to 4 hours on Services
attributes.additional_details:
Tiredness can kill, no doubt you have seen this roadsign on the motorway network. Yet service areas allow only 2 hours free parking.

As a condition of the franchise renewal for motorway service operators could the time limit be increased to say 4 hours  giving motorists/lorry drivers more time to take adequate rest stops.
